channel.title: Custom Commands
channel.description:
[b]*Note i am done making servers atm, and im am looking forward to asking a mod to lock this topic*[/b][size=10pt][color=green] All of the work is now being done by my brother xBRxBeastX Presents.....[/size]
[size=20pt]A Halo-AHOLIC Productions[/size][/color]
[color=green]Edited, added, and deleted some commands!!
::NoQuests (You complete all the missions, and recieve 100k) ::Elite (Makes you an elite) ::Spartan (Makes you an spartan) ::Legendary (takes you to master grunts) ::Heroic (Takes you to brutes) ::Normal (Takes you to grunts) ::ChangeRate (Change your xp rate. 10-200
Tons and tons of other commands, to see the full list, do ::Commands
~Mod Commands~
All of the above commands and,
::Promote (Promote someones grade. *Note: Player grade is before your name in chatbox) ::Boot (Boot, same thing as "::kick") ::TempBan (Bans someone for 10minutes, good for warnings) ::PLeader [username] (You get demoted, and the other person becomes your pos)
::And some other commands. to view the list do ::ModCommands
~Admin Commands~
All of the above commands and,
::FriendsOnly [Username] (Doesnt let the person log in for 30minutes) ::Live (If you use ::FriendsOnly on someone, and then you use ::live, there able to log back in) So you can pick a Temp Ban from 1 sec- 30minutes ::Local (Resets client, everyone logs out, then auto logs in ::BootList ~View who got booted ::KickList ~View who you kicked ::log ~View your statistics, shows u when you started, how many kills you got..ect
~Owner Commands~
::ReconHelm ::FlameReconHelm ::FlameOdstPlate ::CyanEnergySword ::Forge (Instead of ::Object [number] and ::npc [number] we use ::Forge [number] ::GrenadeSet (All grenades) ::Sniper (Sniper is same thing as a glowing dagger) Use it in heroic and your banned ::Rockets ::Spawn [number] ::Boot [Username] ::ban [Usermame] ::ipban [Username] ::Camo (Invisibility) ::Shield (Kinda like a overshield) <--- that command is beta atm [size=20pt] AND NOW, WE WILL TELL THE DROPS[/size]
Grunt- Random junk Dragon- Elite Wings Ice Dragon- Spartan Wings Brute- Rockets Def Brute- Random Str Brute- Random Master brute- Energy sword King brute- Random Master grunt- Random
[size=16pt] :: Now we will tell you the Requirments ::[/size]
Energy sword- Admin+ Or premium member
All wings- owner Or premium member
All Flaming armour except recon- owner or premium member
Sniper- Admin+
All kinds of recon- co-owner+
hayubusa- Admin+ or premium member
Rockets- co-owner+
Cyan Sword- Admin+
Tons of other things coming out that our kept as secret atm! Screenies will be posted later tonight, or tommarrow
[size=25pt]Rate+ Comment if you want to!!![/size][/color]

item.title: Custom Commands
item.dc:creator: @_Co.NR ~Co.NR~
item.description:
@_Co.NR wrote:

Note i am done making servers atm, and im am looking forward to asking a mod to lock this topic[size=10pt][color=green]
All of the work is now being done by my brother
xBRxBeastX Presents…[/size]

[size=20pt]A Halo-AHOLIC Productions[/size][/color]

[color=green]Edited, added, and deleted some commands!!

::NoQuests (You complete all the missions, and recieve 100k)
::Elite (Makes you an elite)
::Spartan (Makes you an spartan)
::Legendary (takes you to master grunts)
::Heroic (Takes you to brutes)
::Normal (Takes you to grunts)
::ChangeRate (Change your xp rate. 10-200

Tons and tons of other commands, to see the full list, do ::Commands

~Mod Commands~

All of the above commands and,

::Promote (Promote someones grade. *Note: Player grade is before your name in chatbox)
::Boot (Boot, same thing as “::kick”)
::TempBan (Bans someone for 10minutes, good for warnings)
::PLeader [username] (You get demoted, and the other person becomes your pos)

::And some other commands. to view the list do ::ModCommands

~Admin Commands~

All of the above commands and,

::FriendsOnly [Username] (Doesnt let the person log in for 30minutes)
::Live (If you use ::FriendsOnly on someone, and then you use ::live, there able to log back in) So you can pick a Temp Ban from 1 sec- 30minutes
::Local (Resets client, everyone logs out, then auto logs in
::BootList ~View who got booted
::KickList ~View who you kicked
::log ~View your statistics, shows u when you started, how many kills you got…ect

~Owner Commands~

::ReconHelm
::FlameReconHelm
::FlameOdstPlate
::CyanEnergySword
::Forge (Instead of ::Object [number] and ::npc [number] we use ::Forge [number]
::GrenadeSet (All grenades)
::Sniper (Sniper is same thing as a glowing dagger) Use it in heroic and your banned
::Rockets
::Spawn [number]
::Boot [Username]
::ban [Usermame]
::ipban [Username]
::Camo (Invisibility)
::Shield (Kinda like a overshield) <— that command is beta atm
[size=20pt]
AND NOW, WE WILL TELL THE DROPS[/size]

Grunt- Random junk
Dragon- Elite Wings
Ice Dragon- Spartan Wings
Brute- Rockets
Def Brute- Random
Str Brute- Random
Master brute- Energy sword
King brute- Random
Master grunt- Random

[size=16pt]
:: Now we will tell you the Requirments ::[/size]

Energy sword- Admin+ Or premium member

All wings- owner Or premium member

All Flaming armour except recon- owner or premium member

Sniper- Admin+

All kinds of recon- co-owner+

hayubusa- Admin+ or premium member

Rockets- co-owner+

Cyan Sword- Admin+

Tons of other things coming out that our kept as secret atm!
Screenies will be posted later tonight, or tommarrow

[size=25pt]Rate+ Comment if you want to!!![/size][/color]
